title: Lewis & Clark National Historic Trail: Park Newspaper
body: Trail Newsletter           Kids take in the scenery at Alice Creek Historic District near Lincoln, MT. Photo by Sue Lattin.     View this Edition (as a pdf) (as turn page)                    Welcome the to the February 2016 edition of The Trail Companion. In this edition you will find stories regarding:    From the Superintendent: Happy New Year - the NPS Centennial    Lewis and Clark Trail Heritage Foundation - $56,512 is Awarded in Trail Stewardship Grants   Trailscapes: Alice Creek Historic District   Portage Route Chapter -LCTHF, Call for Scholar-In-Residence   Tug Collective - Who Eats at Taco Bell?
